alerts.title: Houston Import Constraint
alerts.message: Transmission limits into Houston zone at capacity due to high demand. Monitor for potential conservation appeal.

alerts.title: West Texas Wind Curtailment
alerts.message: Economic curtailment of 2,800 MW wind generation in West Texas due to transmission constraints. Negative prices at western nodes.

alerts.title: Central-East Interface Limit
alerts.message: TLR-5 in effect for Central-East interface. Import restrictions into NYC zone active.

alerts.title: Summer Peak Approaching
alerts.message: High temperatures forecast for Mid-Atlantic. Peak demand expected near 145 GW. All generation resources requested online.

alerts.title: Wind Curtailment Active
alerts.message: Curtailing 1,500 MW wind generation in Oklahoma panhandle. Negative prices throughout central SPP.

alerts.title: Evening Ramp Conservation
alerts.message: Flex Alert issued 4-9 PM. High demand combined with solar ramp-down creating tight conditions. Consumers asked to reduce usage.
